title: Historical View of Fourth Street in Cincinnati, Ohio

creator.publisher: Picturesque America; or, The Land We Live In, A Delineation by Pen and Pencil of the Mountains, Rivers, Lakes with Illustrations on Steel and Wood by Eminent American Artists

viewpoint.description: Street view of Fourth Street in downtown Cincinnati

description: Historic 1893 wood engraving depicting Fourth Street in Cincinnati, Ohio. This street-level view captures the urban architecture and streetscape of downtown Cincinnati during the late 19th century, showcasing the city's commercial development and architectural character of the era.
